comments.comment: Why should those who opted to become foreign nationals, American citizens, should contest elections as they have no interest in our country. They have no moral right to contest elections. Gota n Basil are both foreign nationals. People should judge their ulterior motives.    We should elect honest professionals who love our country not those who are interested only to rob our country's wealth.
comments.author: Hareez Thahireen

replies.replyComment: One cannot deny the fact he opted to become a US citizen as he don't want to live on Sri Lanka. So he preferred US  rather than his mother country.  Why should he now wanted to come back and contest. No one will like a foreign national to rule our country   Of course there are people who love our country and would contest
No one spoke about his citizenship during the war... you people are such hypocrites...  Nahagananda  just gave his UK passport to contest the elections.... no one is speaking about it.....
